---
Song: poovinai
Film: Anandha thANdavam
---
Notes: s r2 g3 m1 p d2 n3 S

poovinai thirandhu koNdu pOi oLindha vAsamE
g  r r   r  g  p   r  r  s   rg  r   s r rd.

poovudan marupadiyum unakkenna snEhamE
g  r r   r g p r r   sr  g  r  s  r rd.

kAtralai suzharCHiyilE meeNdum indha vAsamE
g  r r   r  g  p  r r  s   r   g  r  s r rd.

vAsanai thirumbiyadhil unakkenna kObamE
g r r   r  g  p r r    sr  g  r  s r srd.

vidhi endra AtrilE midhakkindra ilaigaL nAm
g m   S  n  d n np g m   d   p  mm  p   pg

nadhi vazhi pOgindrOm endha karai sErgindrOm
g m   S n   d n  dnp  g m   d p   m  p  mpmg rsr

(kAtralai)

Stanza 1:

thaNdavALam pakkam pakkam thottu koLLa nyAyam illai
g   r s sr  g  r   s  sr  g   r  s  sr g  gp  rgrs

neeyum nAnum pakkam pakkam katti koLLa sondham illai
g  r   s sr  g  r   s  sr  g  r  s  sr g  gp   rgrs

vAsalai theeNdida ninaikkirAi adhu vasappada pOvadhillai
S n S   nd   d p  n n   d dn  gg   d d  p d  p m g   mp

vAnukkum boomikkum endrumE mazhai uravudan sErvadhillai
S n  S   nd d  p   n  d dn g g    dd p d   pm m g   r  (rgr srgmgr s)

(kAtralai)

Stanza 2:

idhaya koottai poottikkoNdE kadhavai thatti kalagam seidhAi 
kadhavai pootti uLLE sendrEn kaNgaL vazhiyE meeNdum vandhAi

varushangaL mAriya pOdhilum pudhu vasandhangaL varuvathuNdu 
vAzhkayil kalaikindra uravugaL pudhu vadivaTHil malarvathuNdu 

(poovinai)
